import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import LOGO from '../images/logo.png' import { BsCheck } from "react-icons/bs" import { BsX } from "react-icons/bs" import { useState } from 'react' export const quiz = () => { let data = require('../data.json'); return (

Category: {data.category}

1 out of 10

{data.question}

) } export default quiz
